name: Duck Duck Chicken
description:
Welcome to duck duck chicken! This is my entry to the 1st Miziziziz game jam. I spent a little less than 30 hours over about a week making the game. There are a few bugs and shortcomings here and there, but this was my very first game I have ever completed and my first game jam partaking in. Sorry it is short! Thanks for playing!

The fireball has particles that only show up if downloaded. Sorry if they are hard to see!

WASD or arrows to move, SPACE to jump, SHIFT to sprint, CTRL or down to crouch, and LMB or E to attack.
